review: I bought this to replace a Wii I was using to access Netflix, etc. that was giving me all kinds of headaches with it's complicated remote controls. Plugged the Fire TV stick into the TV and was up and running in only a few minutes. The remote is easy to use and I'm happy with my purchase.
author: S_LaPo

review: I bought this as an addition to its "Big Brother." I figured that because I have but one Prime account, the "Baby Bro" would be able to access all my "recently viewed" programs, etc. No, darn it. That's why only four stars.
author: jackthemailman

review: Works great. HBO Go Netflix look great. Sharp and clear as my Directv.

review: So far works well and is easy to set up

review: I've been using this device for a few months now. I love the user interface,and how easy it is to set up. Not only am I able to stream different apps like Netflix and Hulu Plus. I can also use AllCast to stream movies from my phone to my fire stick. My one negative would be that it often loses connection randomly.
